feed.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin Core 0.13.1 release candidate 3

entry.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin Core 0.13.1 release candidate 3
entry.summary: Bitcoin has released a new version, 0.13.1rc3, on GitHub with a small fix to an out-of-place assertion in rc2. As the change was simple, no official binaries have been made available for rc3, and the release of 0.13.1 should not be delayed. Users are encouraged to test the new release before the final tag on Thursday and report any bugs using the issue tracker on GitHub.
